name: Adriatic Hotel

reviews.text: Stayed there for 3 nights. Great location near vatican city.
reviews.title: Good hotel, great location
Perfect Hotel in Excellent, Safe Location
reviews.text: Be sure to book room with air conditioning. On the 1st night we had a room with no a/c and felt unsafe to leave the backdoor open, which was the only way to ventilate the room. Horrible night. The second day a room became available. It was a world of difference. The room was newer, bigger, with better views, and air conditioning! Great 2 nights!
The room top deck was nice as well. We got a bottle of wine and a pizza from close by stores and had low key, romantic night.
reviews.title: Hidden Treasure - Great Service & good for Groups
